description: [FinFisher](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0182) takes a screenshot of the screen and displays it on top of all other windows for few seconds in an apparent attempt to hide some messages showed by the system during the setup process.(Citation: FinFisher Citation)(Citation: Microsoft FinFisher March 2018)
